00017 SSP_FORCEINLINE int ssp_cmpestra_SSE4_2 ( __m128i a, int la, __m128i b, int lb, const int mode )
00018 {
00019     switch( mode & 0xFF )
00020     {
00021         CASE_256( _mm_cmpestra, a, la, b, lb );
00022     }
00023 }
